alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rockdale, DeKalb, southwestern Gwinnett and eastern Fulton Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1115 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Decatur, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Snellville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, Lakeview Estates, North Atlanta, Mountain Park, Belmont and Sweet Auburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
